attributes.action: open the mobile network industry to competition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since June 2007 the mobile companies 02 orange 3 Vodafone T-Mobile Virgin have been operating a cartel.

They have been systematically blocking ranges of numbers because they class them as call-foward numbers. 

Why does it cost up to £1 a minute to call abroad from a UK mobile phone when people who are using access numbers are able to pay pennies a minute to call their friends.

The high charges are not in proportion to the true cost of providing the service and now that there are VOIP providers out there connecting people they are being forced out of business.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
